00029 typedef struct fa_archive_writer_t fa_archive_writer_t;

00041 #define FA_COMPRESSION_MAX_BLOCK (16384)
00042 #define FA_ARCHIVE_CACHE_SIZE (FA_COMPRESSION_MAX_BLOCK * 4)

00044 struct fa_archive_t
00045 {
00046         fa_header_t* toc;
00047         fa_mode_t mode;
00048 
00049         uint64_t base;
00050         void* fd;
00051 
00052         struct
00053         {
00054                 uint32_t offset;
00055                 uint32_t fill;
00056                 uint8_t* data;
00057                 fa_file_t* owner;
00058         } cache;
00059 };
00060 
00061 struct fa_archive_writer_t
00062 {
00063         fa_archive_t archive;
00064 
00065         uint32_t alignment;
00066 
00067         struct
00068         {
00069                 uint32_t original;
00070                 uint32_t compressed;
00071         } offset;
00072 
00073         struct
00074         {
00075                 fa_writer_entry_t* data;
00076                 uint32_t count;
00077                 uint32_t capacity;
00078         } entries;
00079 };
00080 
00081 struct fa_writer_entry_t
00082 {
00083         char* path;
00084 
00085         fa_offset_t container;
00086         fa_offset_t offset;
00087 
00088         fa_compression_t compression;
00089 
00090         struct
00091         {
00092                 uint32_t original;
00093                 uint32_t compressed;
00094         } size;
00095 
00096         SHA1Context hash;
00097 };
00098 
00099 struct fa_file_t
00100 {
00101         fa_archive_t* archive;
00102         const fa_entry_t* entry;
00103 
00104         uint64_t base;
00105 
00106         struct
00107         {
00108                 uint32_t offset;
00109                 uint32_t fill;
00110                 uint8_t* data;
00111         } buffer;
00112 
00113         struct
00114         {
00115                 uint32_t original;
00116                 uint32_t compressed;
00117         } offset;
00118 };
00119 
00120 struct fa_file_writer_t
00121 {
00122         fa_file_t file;
00123         fa_writer_entry_t* entry;
00124 };
00125 
00126 struct fa_dir_t
00127 {
00128         const fa_archive_t* archive;
00129         const fa_container_t* parent;
00130 
00131         const fa_container_t* container;
00132         uint32_t index;
00133 };
